main event: A round, reddish-orange object, resembling a falling star, exploded and left a white smoke trail while falling in a small arc toward the ground.
interesting points: The UFO was described as round, the size of a basketball, and reddish-orange in color.
It exploded, giving off a reddish-orange glare that lit up the immediate vicinity and left a white smoke trail.
The object was observed falling in a small arc toward the ground and disappeared instantaneously after the explosion.
The sighting took place in Soap Lake, Washington.
The observer, 34 years old, witnessed the UFO as a factory service attendant.
result: prosaic explanation, it was likely a meteor
sighted object: round, reddish-orange object resembling a falling star
